raw: 11,000 is the last ray of hope for bulls: Sameet Chavan of Angel Broking .

raw: Terrible week for financial markets , 11,000 last ray of hope

raw: It ’s been a week of distress , intimidation and a lot of uncertainties for all equity across the globe .
replaced: It ’s been a week of distress , intimidation and a lot of uncertainties for all equity across the globe .

raw: Until last week , probably no one had sensed how massive the overall adverse effect of Coronavirus would be .
replaced: Until last week , probably no one had sensed how massive the overall adverse effect of Coronavirus would be .

raw: The moment it started spreading rapidly outside China , things became worse and this eventually resulted into a complete meltdown in global For us , we saw some hope of revival on Thursday but Friday ’s huge gap down followed by sustained selling poured water on it .
replaced: The moment Coronavirus  this spreading rapidly outside China , things became worse and this eventually resulted into a complete meltdown in global For us , we saw some hope of revival on Thursday but Friday ’s huge gap down followed by sustained selling poured water on Coronavirus .

raw: Eventually , we concluded by registering the biggest weekly cut after 2008 .

raw: There was no respect shown for any major support as we saw breaching of crucial points one after another .

raw: Honestly speaking , no analysis works in such kind of fearsome environment .

raw: Although , the next path of action is solely dependent on further developments with respect to coronavirus ; but still , let us see where we stand now and what are the next key levels to watch .

raw: At present , we are placed precisely at the 161 per cent retracement of the recent up move from 11,614.50 to 12,246.70 .

raw: On the upside , Friday ’s huge gap area of 11,384.80 – 11,536.70 remains to be an immediate hurdle .

raw: In our sense , if any sustainable recovery has to happen this week , it should be V - shaped or steep in nature .

raw: If that does n’t happen and if the recovery is gradual , that would be an ominous sign for the bulls .

raw: Momentum traders are advised to stay light and should avoid leveraged positions in such kind of global uncertainty .

raw: But having said that , historically it ’s been proven that such panics generally offer very good opportunity for investors who are willing to build their portfolio .
